briefTitle: Safety and Effectiveness Study of The Swedish Adjustable Gastric Band (SAGB) in the Treatment of Morbid Obesity

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent of Subjects Who Had Adverse Events With the Swedish Adjustable Gastric Band (SAGB)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of device-related adverse events (AEs) and device malfunctions occurring in subjects implanted with the Swedish Adjustable Gastric Band from baseline throughout the three-year post-operative period.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Excess Body Weight (EBW)
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in excess body weight at 3-years post-operative minus baseline excess weight. Excess weight is computed as baseline weight minus Ideal weight. Ideal weight as provided in the 1983 Metropolitan Life Height and Weight Table using the upper limit of the midpoint range.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Body Mass Index (BMI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in Body Mass Index (BMI) at three-years post-operative minus baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Absolute Weight
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute weight loss as measured on a standardized Tanita Scale (used at all sites) at three-years post-operative minus baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Quality of Life (QOL) Measures
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in QOL measures at three-years post-operative minus baseline. SF-36 scores from 0-100 with higher scores representing better QOL.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1c)
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c), from baseline to three-years post-operative.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of All Adverse Events of Subjects Implanted With the SAGB
outcomeMeasures.description: The evaluation of all Adverse Events of subjects implanted with the Swedish Adjustable Gastric Band throughout the three-year post-operative period (related to device and unrelated to device).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Excess Weight Loss
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent Excess Weight Loss (%EWL) with the SAGB at three years post operatively minus baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in High Density Lipoproteins (HDL)
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in High Density Lipoproteins (HDL), at three-years post-operative minus baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Low Density Lipoproteins (LDL)
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in Low Density Lipoproteins (LDL), at three-years post-operative minus baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Total Cholesterol
outcomeMeasures.description: Changes in Total Cholesterol, at three-years post-operative minus baseline.
